anime.title: Naruto
anime.description: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with a sealed demon fox spirit within him, embarks on a journey to become the Hokage, the leader of his village.

anime.title: One Piece
anime.description: Monkey D. Luffy and his crew set sail on the Grand Line in search of the ultimate treasure known as One Piece.

anime.title: Attack on Titan
anime.description: In a world where humanity is on the brink of extinction due to giant humanoid creatures, a group of young soldiers fights for survival.

anime.title: My Hero Academia
anime.description: In a world where people have superpowers, a young boy with no abilities enrolls in a prestigious hero academy to fulfill his dreams.

anime.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
anime.description: Two brothers use alchemy in their quest to find the Philosopher's Stone and undo the consequences of a failed alchemical experiment.

anime.title: Death Note
anime.description: A high school student gains a notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it, leading to a battle of wits with a detective.

anime.title: Dragon Ball Z
anime.description: Goku and his friends defend Earth against powerful foes and seek powerful Dragon Balls to make their wishes come true.

anime.title: Sword Art Online
anime.description: Players trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG must clear the game's levels to escape, but death in the game means death in real life.

anime.title: Cowboy Bebop
anime.description: Bounty hunters travel through space in pursuit of criminals while dealing with their own troubled pasts.

anime.title: Hunter x Hunter
anime.description: A young boy becomes a Hunter to find his missing father and explore the dangerous world of hunters and beasts.

anime.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
anime.description: Teenagers pilot giant mechs to protect Earth from mysterious beings known as Angels.

anime.title: Fairy Tail
anime.description: A young mage joins the Fairy Tail guild and embarks on various adventures with his magical companions.

anime.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
anime.description: A young boy becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and save his sister from a curse.

anime.title: Dragon Ball
anime.description: Follow the adventures of Goku as he grows into a powerful martial artist and defends the Earth.

anime.title: Bleach
anime.description: A teenager gains the powers of a Soul Reaper and is tasked with protecting the living world from evil spirits and Hollows.

anime.title: One Punch Man
anime.description: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, seeks a worthy challenge.

anime.title: Steins;Gate
anime.description: A group of friends accidentally invents a time machine and gets involved in a complex web of time-travel conspiracies.

anime.title: My Neighbor Totoro
anime.description: Two sisters move to the countryside and discover magical creatures in the nearby forest, including Totoro.

anime.title: Death Parade
anime.description: In a mysterious bar, deceased souls are judged through intense psychological games to determine their afterlife fate.

anime.title: Mob Psycho 100
anime.description: A middle schooler with powerful psychic abilities must balance his supernatural life with everyday challenges.

anime.title: Fullmetal Alchemist
anime.description: Two brothers use alchemy to find the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed experiment.

anime.title: Attack on Titan: Junior High
anime.description: A comedic take on the Attack on Titan universe, set in a junior high school with quirky versions of the main characters.

anime.title: Black Clover
anime.description: A young boy born without magic power aims to become the Wizard King by working hard and never giving up.

anime.title: One Piece: Strong World
anime.description: The Straw Hat Pirates encounter an old enemy in a floating island full of powerful creatures.

anime.title: Spirited Away
anime.description: A young girl gets trapped in a mysterious and magical world and must find a way to save her parents.

anime.title: Tokyo Revengers
anime.description: A young man discovers he can time-travel and tries to change the past to prevent tragic events in his life.

anime.title: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
anime.description: Tanjiro and his friends board a demon-infested train to investigate mysterious disappearances.

anime.title: Attack on Titan: The Final Season
anime.description: The epic battle between humanity and Titans reaches its climax in the final season.

anime.title: Death Note: Relight
anime.description: A recap of the original Death Note series with additional scenes and perspectives.

anime.title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
anime.description: The bounty hunting crew of the Bebop investigates a terrorist threat on Mars.

anime.title: Death Note: Near and Mello
anime.description: A spin-off story focusing on the successors of L as they face a new Kira threat.

anime.title: My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising
anime.description: Class 1-A faces a powerful villain on a remote island during their hero work-studies.

anime.title: Attack on Titan: No Regrets
anime.description: The backstory of Levi Ackerman and his journey to join the Survey Corps.

anime.title: Hunter x Hunter: Phantom Rouge
anime.description: Gon and his friends seek the Phantom Troupe to retrieve Kurapika's stolen eyes.

anime.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
anime.description: The climactic conclusion of the Neon Genesis Evangelion series.

anime.title: Fairy Tail: Dragon Cry
anime.description: The Fairy Tail guild embarks on a mission to recover a stolen magical artifact.

anime.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Entertainment District Arc
anime.description: Tanjiro and his friends investigate a series of disappearances in the Entertainment District.

anime.title: Dragon Ball Super
anime.description: Goku faces new powerful foes in his quest for even greater strength.

anime.title: One Punch Man: Road to Hero
anime.description: A prequel story about Saitama's early days as a hero for fun.

anime.title: Cowboy Bebop: Knockin' on Heaven's Door
anime.description: The Bebop crew investigates a terrorist plot on Mars involving a deadly virus.

anime.title: My Hero Academia: World Heroes' Mission
anime.description: The heroes of Class 1-A must stop a global terrorist organization threatening to release a dangerous gas.

anime.title: Attack on Titan: Lost Girls
anime.description: An OVA series that explores the stories of two girls from the Attack on Titan universe.

anime.title: Hunter x Hunter: Greed Island
anime.description: Gon and Killua enter the virtual world of Greed Island in search of Gon's father.

anime.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Rebuild of Evangelion
anime.description: A series of movies that retell and expand upon the Neon Genesis Evangelion story.

anime.title: Fairy Tail: Grand Magic Games
anime.description: The Fairy Tail guild competes in the Grand Magic Games, facing rival guilds and powerful foes.

anime.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Swordsmith Village Arc
anime.description: Tanjiro and his friends visit a swordsmith village to repair their weapons and face new challenges.

anime.title: Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F'
anime.description: Goku and Vegeta must face the revived Frieza and his army of loyal followers.

anime.title: One Punch Man: Season 2
anime.description: Saitama continues his quest for a worthy opponent while facing new threats.

anime.title: Cowboy Bebop: Ein's Summer Vacation
anime.description: A short special episode featuring the quirky corgi, Ein, going on summer adventures.

anime.title: Spirited Away: The Return to the Spirit World
anime.description: Chihiro returns to the spirit world to face new challenges and reunite with her friends.

anime.title: One Piece: Stampede
anime.description: The Straw Hat Pirates participate in the Pirate Expo, where pirates from around the world gather.

anime.title: Naruto: Shippuden
anime.description: Naruto Uzumaki continues his ninja journey and faces new challenges to save his friends and the world.

anime.title: Attack on Titan: The Final Season Part 2
anime.description: The epic battle against the Titans reaches its conclusion as humanity fights for survival.

anime.title: Hunter x Hunter: Chimera Ant Arc
anime.description: Gon and Killua face the deadly Chimera Ants in a battle for survival and humanity's future.

anime.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Evangelion: 3.0+1.0 Thrice Upon a Time
anime.description: The final installment of the Rebuild of Evangelion series concludes the epic story of Eva.

anime.title: Fairy Tail: Tartaros Arc
anime.description: The Fairy Tail guild faces the dark Tartaros guild in a battle to save the world from destruction.

anime.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Mugen Train Arc (TV Version)
anime.description: The Mugen Train Arc retells the events of the Demon Slayer movie in a TV series format.

anime.title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
anime.description: Goku and Vegeta encounter the powerful Saiyan warrior, Broly, in an epic battle.

anime.title: One Punch Man: Road to Hero 2.0
anime.description: Saitama's journey continues as he seeks new challenges and confronts new threats.

anime.title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie - Knockin' on Heaven's Door (Special Edition)
anime.description: A special edition of the Cowboy Bebop movie featuring additional scenes and content.
